heading: Users choose us
description: What our users say about us, see what they think about us

testimonials.name: Elena Kovacs
testimonials.testimonial: Kivon completely changed how I move assets across chains. I transferred ETH from Arbitrum to zkSync in under 20 seconds—and paid almost nothing in gas. It's fast, cheap, and actually works.

testimonials.name: Jason McAllister
testimonials.testimonial: The fiat on-ramp is seamless. I bought BTC with my debit card in minutes. No hidden fees, and I didn’t have to leave the app. Kivon is now my go-to for buying crypto with fiat.

testimonials.name: Adaeze Umeh
testimonials.testimonial: Most apps don’t support Nigeria well, but Kivon worked flawlessly. I used Apple Pay to buy USDT and bridged it to Base without touching a CEX. Everything felt smooth and secure.

testimonials.name: Tobias Lehmann
testimonials.testimonial: I’ve tried many exchanges, but Kivon stands out for one reason—zero custody risk. I connected my Ledger, swapped tokens instantly, and never gave up control of my funds. That’s real trust.

testimonials.name: Mariana Ferreira
testimonials.testimonial: Kivon’s KYC process was surprisingly smooth. I submitted my ID and had full access in under 15 minutes. The transparency and ease made me feel safe using it as my main trading hub.

testimonials.name: Marcelo Silva
testimonials.testimonial: I’ve been using Kivon for a few months now, and I’ve been really happy with the service. The platform is easy to use, and the transactions are fast. I’ve recommended it to my friends and family.

testimonials.name: Javier Rodriguez
testimonials.testimonial: I am extremely delighted with the exceptional service provided by the Changelly crypto swap app.
